name: op.gg - dark theme 'by Kiruha'
css:
@-moz-document domain("op.gg") {
:root {
    --fg: #e0e2e4;
    --bg: #262626;
    --bg-odd: #262626;
    --fg-2: #b1b1b1;
    --bg-2: #262626;
    --fg-muted: #999;
    --fg-input: #A7CCF1;
    --bg-input: #262626;
    --fg-input-hover: #e0e2e4;
    --bg-input-hover: #262626;
    --border: solid 0.5px #b1b1b1;
    --border-color: #b1b1b1;
    --fg-link: #1f8ecd;
    --fg-link-hover: #1f8ecd;
    --fg-link-visited: #1f8ecd;
    --fg-disabled: #ddd;
    --bg-disabled: #777;
    --fg-error: #fff;
    --fg-warning: #000;
    --fg-info: #fff;
    --fg-success: #fff;
    --bg-error: #262626;
    --bg-warning: #fa4;
    --bg-info: #225984;
    --bg-success: #151;
    --syntax-fg: #f1f2f3;
    --syntax-fg-2: #E8E2B7;
    --syntax-bg: #262626;
    --syntax-bg-2: #262626;
    --syntax-comment: #7c7c7c;
    --syntax-builtin: #93C763;
    --syntax-function: #b1b1b1;
    --syntax-keyword: #7CCADD;
    --syntax-number: #FFCD22;
    --syntax-string: #1f8ecd;
    --syntax-font-family: "Menlo", "Liberation Mono", "Consolas", "DejaVu Sans Mono", "Ubuntu Mono", "Courier New", "andale mono", "lucida console", monospace;
    --selection-fg: #000
}
::-moz-selection {
    color: var(--bg) !important;
    background: var(--fg-link) !important;
}
::selection {
    color: var(--bg) !important;
    background: var(--fg-link) !important;
}

html,
body,
.Modal .Content,
.Box,
.Box > .Tab > .TabList > .Item.active,
.Box > .Tab > .TabList > .Item.active:hover,
.Box > .Tab + .Content,
.GameAverageStats,
.SummonersMostGameTable > .Body > .Row.Odd > .Cell,
.MasteryPageWrap > .MasteryPageName,
.RunePageWrap > .RunePageName,
.champion-list-filter,
.l-champion-index-content .l-champion-index-content--main,
.l-champion-statistics-menu,
.champion-skill-build__table th,
.champion-skill-build__table td,
.champion-stats-summary-rune__item.active,
.champion-matchup-header,
.champion-matchup-search {
    background-color: var(--bg)
}
.l-header,
.Modal .Title,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.active > a,
.SummonerLayout > .ContentWrap,
.Box > .Tab > .TabList > .Item,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Content > .SelectMatchChampionList > .Item.Recent,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Content > .SelectMatchChampionList > .Item.All,
.GameItem.extended.Win > .GameDetail,
.GameItem.extended.Win > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader li a,
.tablesorter > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.GameItem.extended.Lose > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader li a,
.GameItem.extended.Lose > .GameDetail,
.main,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.inGame:hover > a,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.inGame.active > a,
.MasteryPageList > .Button,
.RunePageList > .Button,
.l-wrap--index,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Footer,
.ChampionTrendSummaryHeader ul li,
.ChampionTrendSummaryChampionList li:nth-child(2n) a,
.ChampionDetailLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button.active,
.ChampionStatsDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.ChampionStatsFilterMenu ul li.active,
.StatisticsSummonersWithLeague > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.LadderRankingTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SearchChampion,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SelectChampion,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox > .Content,
.community-article__list__item:hover,
.ChampionTrendSummaryHeader ul,
.ChampionBanRateSummary > .Content > .Table > .Content > .Row.Odd > .Cell,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button,
.menu-dropdown,
.summoner-search-history__title li.active,
.gnb-list-item__search .summoner-search-history,
.MatchBuild > .ItemBuild > .List > .Item > .Items,
.MatchBuild > .ItemBuild > .List > .Item > .Bar,
.BestGGBox > .Footer,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.summoner-search-extra .summoner-search-history,
.champion-index-trend-header,
.l-champion-index-content .l-champion-index-content--side,
.champion-index-trend-position__item,
.champion-overview__header,
.champion-box-header,
.champion-matchup-table th,
.champion-matchup-graph-header,
.champion-stats__table__header,
tr:nth-child(2n) .champion-stats__table__cell {
    background-color: var(--bg-2)
}
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Label,
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Content > .Row.First > .Cell {
    background-color: var(--bg-2) !important
}
.RegionTool .Content > .Section > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell,
.l-menu,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .PastRank > .PastRankList > .Item,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item > a,
.GameItem.extended.Win > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader li a:hover,
.GameDetailTable > .Header,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Damage > .Progress,
.ChampionWinRatioBox,
.Box > .Title + .Content,
.GameItem.extended.Lose > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader li a:hover,
.MatchTeamAnalysisHeader ul,
.MatchDetailLayout .MatchDetailContent,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Body > .Row.TopRanker,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Body > .Row,
.MasteryPageList > .Button > .Number,
.MasteryPageList > .Button.active > .Number,
.RunePageList > .Button > .Number,
.RunePageList > .Button.active > .Number,
.RunePageWrap > .RunePageStatistics,
.RunePageSummary,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Content > .Row.series > .Cell,
.Box > .Navigation + .Content,
.ChampionTrendSummaryHeader ul li.active,
.ChampionTrendSummaryPosition ul,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button.active > .Role,
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.ChampionRankingSummaryBox > .Content > .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.ChampionStatsDetailTable > .Content > .Row.Odd > .Cell,
.ChampionStatsFilterMenu ul li,
.StatisticsFilter > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.StatisticsChampionTable > .Content > .Row.Top > .Cell,
.StatisticsSummonersWithLeague > .Footer > .Row,
.LadderRankingTable > .Body > .Row.TopRanker > .Cell,
.LadderRankingTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell,
.Button.Gray,
.l-wrap--index .community-best,
.bestgg-summary__content__title,
.bestgg-summary__content__item,
.l-wrap--index .bestgg-summary,
.summoner-search-history__title li,
.MatchBuild .Title,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row:nth-child(2n),
.first-time-user,
.first-time-user__content,
.champion-index-trend-position__item.active,
.champion-index-trend-labels,
.champion-index-trend-champion__list,
.champion-overview__table,
.champion-overview__sub-header,
.champion-stats-summary-rune__item,
.champion-box,
.champion-box-content,
.champion-stats-summary-ranking__table tr,
.champion-matchup-table tr,
.l-champion-matchup-side,
.champion-matchup-champion-list__item,
.champion-stats__filter__item.active,
.champion-stats__filter__item,
.champion-stats__table__cell {
    background-color: var(--bg-odd)
}
.MatchDetailHeader ul li.active a {
    background-color: var(--bg-odd) !important
}
input[type="text"],
input[type="password"],
select,
textarea,
.form-control,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .FavoriteButton,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Header,
.form-control input,
.form-control textarea,
.SearchChampionInput > .InputTextWrap,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SearchChampion > .SearchChampionForm > .SearchInput,
.TeamIndexListBox > .Content > .TeamIndexGrid > .SearchTeamInput > input,
.champion-list-filter__keyword input {
    background-color: var(--bg-input);
    color: var(--fg-input)
}
input[type="text"]:focus,
input[type="password"]:focus,
select:focus,
textarea:focus,
.form-control:focus,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .FavoriteButton:hover,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Header:hover,
.form-control input:focus,
.form-control textarea:focus,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SearchChampion > .SearchChampionForm > .SearchInput:focus,
.TeamIndexListBox > .Content > .TeamIndexGrid > .SearchTeamInput > input:focus,
.champion-list-filter__keyword input:focus {
    background-color: var(--bg-input-hover);
    color: var(--fg-input-hover)
}
.gnb-btn-setting__server,
.RegionTool .Content > .Section > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.active,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item:hover > a,
.Box > .Tab > .TabList > .Item:hover,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Content > .SelectMatchChampionList > .Item > .Content > .ChampionList > .Item > .Link:hover,
.MasteryPageList > .Button.active,
.RunePageList > .Button.active,
.Button.White:hover,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueHeader > .LeagueInfo > .LeagueRankList > .Item.active > .LeagueRank,
.ChampionDetailLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.active > a,
.ChampionStatsFilterMenu ul li:hover,
.ChampionStatsFilterMenu ul li.All:hover,
.SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Value.LevelUP,
.SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Value.LevelUP.Master,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu > .Actions > .Action > .Button:hover,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button:hover,
.menu-dropdown__item:hover,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .RealContent .SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Value.LevelUP,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .RealContent .SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Value.LevelUP.Master,
.champion-stats__filter__item--all:hover,
.champion-stats__filter__item--all:hover * {
    background-color: var(--fg-link);
    color: var(--bg)
}
.ChampionTrendSummaryHeader ul li::before {
    background-color: var(--border-color)
}
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Content > .SelectMatchChampionList > .Item.Recent,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Content > .SelectMatchChampionList > .Item.All,
.l-wrap--index {
    background-image: none
}
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Header > .Input,
.GameItem.Win > .Content > .StatsButton,
.Button.White,
.champion-stats-header__tab__item.active {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)
}
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team.Result-WIN,
.GameDetailTable.Result-WIN > .Content,
.GameDetailTable.Result-WIN > .Content > .Row.isRequester,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Bar.Result-WIN,
.GameItem.Win > .Content,
.GameItem.Win > .Content > .StatsButton,
.WinRatioGraph > .Graph > .Fill.Left {
    background-color: #0b53b559/* WIN: BLUE */
}
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team.Result-LOSE,
.GameDetailTable.Result-LOSE > .Content,
.GameDetailTable.Result-LOSE > .Content > .Row.isRequester,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Bar.Result-LOSE,
.GameItem.Lose > .Content,
.GameItem.Lose > .Content > .StatsButton,
.WinRatioGraph > .Graph > .Fill.Right {
    background-color: #7d3d3a/* LOSE: RED */
}
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team.Result-REMAKE,
.GameDetailTable.Result-REMAKE > .Content,
.GameDetailTable.Result-REMAKE > .Content > .Row.isRequester,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Bar.Result-REMAKE,
.GameItem.Remake > .Content,
.GameItem.Remake > .Content > .StatsButton {
    background-color: #666/* REMAKE: GREY */
}
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content:hover > .Actions,
.perk-page__image,
.perk-page__item--keystone .perk-page__image,
.champion-matchup-champion-list__item:hover,
td.champion-matchup-data--win,
td.champion-matchup-data--win:first-child {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
}

body,
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
.site__name,
.Modal .Title,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .PastRank > .PastRankList > .Item,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.active > a,
.Box > .Tab > .TabList > .Item.active > .Link,
.ChampionBox > .ChampionInfo > .ChampionName > a,
.Box > .Title,
.Box > .Navigation .List > .Item.active > .Link,
.jcf-select-SelectMatchTypes .jcf-select-text,
.GameAverageStats tr > .MostChampion ul li .Name,
.GameItem > .Content > .GameStats,
.GameItem > .Content > .KDA > .KDA > .Kill,
.GameAverageStats tr > .KDA > .KDA > .Kill,
.GameAverageStats tr > .Title,
.GameAverageStats tr > .Summary .WinRatioGraph .Text,
.GameItem > .Content > .GameSettingInfo > .ChampionName,
.GameItem > .Content > .KDA > .KDARatio,
.GameItem > .Content > .KDA > .KDARatio .KDARatio,
.GameItem > .Content > .KDA > .KDA,
.GameItem > .Content > .Stats,
.GameItem > .Content > .FollowPlayers.Names > .Team > .Summoner > .SummonerName > .Link,
.MatchDetailHeader ul li.active a,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.SummonerName > .Link,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.KDA > .KDA,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Tier,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.CS,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.CS,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team > .TeamScore > .Value > .Kill,
.SummonersMostGameTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.SummonerName > .Link,
.SummonersMostGameTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell,
.MatchTeamAnalysisHeader ul li.active a,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.ChampionName > a,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.KDA > .KDA,
.MasteryPageWrap .mastery-page-type__header,
.RunePageWrap > .RunePageName,
.RunePageSummaryList > .Item,
.RunePageStatistics > .RunePageStatisticsList > .Item,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueHeader > .LeagueInfo > .LeagueTierRank,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell.SummonerName > .Link,
.ErrorMessage,
.Button.White,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Header > .Input,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Header > .Input,
.GameItem > .Content > .Stats > .Ward,
.PageHeaderWrap > .PageDescription > .Text,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content > .ChampionName,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content > .GameInfo,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Footer,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.active .Link,
.ChampionIndexGrid > .Item > .Link.Champion > .ChampionName,
.ChampionTrendSummaryHeader ul li.active a,
.ChampionTrendSummaryHeader ul li.active a:hover,
.ChampionTrendSummaryPosition ul li.active a,
.ChampionTrendSummaryChampionList li .Champion .ChampionName,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button.active > .Role > .Label,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button.active > .Stats,
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.PickRate,
.ChampionMatchupSummaryTable .ChampionName,
.ChampionMatchupSummaryTable .WinRate b,
.ChampionRankingSummaryBox > .Content > .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell.SummonerName > .Link,
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Single > .Name,
.ChampionStatsDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.PickRate,
.ChampionStatsDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Single > .Name,
.ChampionStatsFilterMenu ul li .Rate b,
.SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Label,
.RuneItemList > .Item,
.ChampionStatsDetailTable .mastery-page-type__header,
.ChampionStatsFilterMenu-KeystoneMastery .Name,
.StatisticsChampionTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.StatisticsFilter > .Content > .Row > .Cell > .ButtonWrap > .RadioButton > .Label,
.statsLeagueBox > .FormItem > .RadioItems > .RadioItem > .ItemList > .Title,
.LadderRankingTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SelectChampion > .Champion > .Action > .ChampionName,
.TeamIndexListBox > .Content > .TeamIndexGrid > .SearchTeamList > .Item > .TeamName,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox > .Content > .Roster > li > a > .SummonerName,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox > .Title > .TeamName,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu > .Actions > .Action > .Button,
.community-article__list__item__title,
.bestgg-summary__title > div,
.bestgg-summary__content__date,
.bestgg-summary__match__score em,
.bestgg-summary__match__team div,
.bestgg-summary__team__ranking,
.ChampionRankingSummary > .Content > .Item > .Title,
.ChampionBanRateSummary > .Content > .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Champion > .Percent,
.summoner-search-history__message span,
.summoner-search-history__list .Item > a,
.GameAverageStats tr > .PositionStats > ul > li .PositionStatContent .WinRatio span,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team > .ObjectScore,
.MatchBuild .Title,
.MatchBuild > .ItemBuild > .List > .Item > .Time,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .RealContent .SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Label,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .SideContent > .Item > .HotKey,
.MatchBuild > .RuneMastery > .Rune > .RuneList > .Item > .Name,
.BestGGBox > .Content,
.SummonersMostGameTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.WinRatio,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Title,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Title > small,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Title > small.Time,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell.SummonerName > .SummonerName,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .Team,
.first-time-user__title,
.first-time-user__item h1,
.champion-index__champion-item__name,
.champion-index-trend-header h2,
.champion-index-trend-position__item.active a,
.champion-stats-menu__list__item.active a,
.champion-overview__stats--pick strong,
.champion-skill-build__table td,
.champion-overview__sub-header,
.champion-stats-summary-rune__name,
.champion-box--trend .champion-stats-trend-average,
.champion-stats-summary-ranking__table__summoner span,
.champion-matchup-header,
.champion-matchup-table td,
.champion-matchup-graph-header-item.active a,
.champion-matchup-champion-list__item,
.champion-stats__table__header--title,
.tablesorter-header-inner,
.champion-stats__single__item span,
.MMRBox > .Content > table.TierRankBOX td.MMR {
    color: var(--fg)
}
.menu__item--active > a,
.champion-stats-header__position > * {
    color: var(--fg) !important
}
.RegionTool .Content > .Section > h2,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .Rank > .LadderRank > .Link > .ranking,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .Name,
.SummonerRatingMedium > .TierRankInfo > .TierInfo > .LeaguePoints,
.SummonerRatingLine > .TypeTeam > .StatSummaryType,
.GameAverageStats tr > .MostChampion ul li .WonLose,
.GameAverageStats tr > .MostChampion ul li .KDA,
.GameAverageStats tr > .KDA > .KDARatio > .KDARatio,
.SummonersMostGameTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.WinRatio,
.MatchAnalysisListItemContent h4,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.jcf-select-SelectMatchTypes:hover > .jcf-select-text,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item .Link,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content > .SummonerName,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Footer > a > .Extra,
.ChampionTrendSummaryChampionList li .Rank,
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Label > a,
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Label,
.ChampionRankingSummaryBox > .Content > .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Rank,
.ChampionStatsDetailTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.StatisticsFilter > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.StatisticsChampionTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.StatisticsChampionTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Rank,
.StatisticsSummonersWithLeague th,
.StatisticsSummonersWithLeague .Time,
.LadderRankingTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.LadderRankingTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell.Rank,
.ChampionRankingSummaryBox > .Title > .ChampionName,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox > .Content > .Roster > li > a > .SummonerTierRank,
.community-article__list__item__rank,
.bestgg-summary__content__title h3,
.bestgg-summary__player__ranking,
.community-article__list__item__title em,
.ChampionBanRateSummary > .Content > .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.SummonerRatingMedium > .TierRankInfo > .TierRank,
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell.MMR,
.champion-index__version,
.champion-index-trend-label,
.champion-overview__header,
.champion-matchup-table th,
.champion-matchup-sort,
.champion-matchup-sort__button,
.champion-skill-build__table th,
.MMRBox > .Content > table.TierRankBOX td.MMRSubTitle,
.MMRBox > .Content > table.TierRankBOX td.TierRankString,
.MMRBox > .Footer > .AverageTierScore {
    color: var(--fg-2)
}
.muted,
.RegionTool .Content > .Section > .Extra > a,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .Rank > .LadderRank > .Link,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .LastUpdate,
.SummonerRatingMedium,
.ChampionBox,
.ChampionBox > .PersonalKDA > .KDAEach > .Bar,
.SummonerRatingLine,
.SummonerRatingLine > .TierRank,
.GameAverageStats tr > .KDA > .KDA,

.MultiSearchInput > .FormItem {

}
.MultiSearchInput > .FormItem > .TextArea {
    display: inline-block;

    padding: 12px 12px 0;
    color: #5e5e5e;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 16px;
    outline: none;
    resize: none;
    overflow: auto;
}

}

}

}

}

}

}
.MultiSearchResult > .Title {

}

}

}
.ChampionSmallStats > .Table {

}

.ChampionSmallStats > .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Champion {

.ChampionSmallStats > .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Champion > .ChampionName {

.MultiSearchTable {
    display: table;
    width: 100%;
    table-layout: fixed;
}
.MultiSearchResultRow {
    border-top: 1px solid #cdd2d2;
}
.MultiSearchResultRow .MultiSearchResultRowHeader {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d2cdcd;
}
.MultiSearchResultRow:first-child {
    border-top: none;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowHeader {
    background: #262626;
    position: relative;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowHeader .Summoner {
    padding: 7px 10px;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowHeader .Summoner a {
    text-decoration: none;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowHeader .Summoner a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowHeader .Summoner img {
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowHeader .Summoner .SummonerName {
    line-height: 19px;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #fff;
    vertical-align: middle;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowHeader .PreviousSeason {
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    margin-top: 9px;
    margin-right: 10px;
    text-align: right;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowHeader .PreviousSeason li {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 4px 5px;
    line-height: 12px;
    font-size: 11px;
    border-radius: 2px;
    border: 1px solid #cdd2d2;
    background: #484848;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent {
    display: table;
    width: 100%;
    table-layout: fixed;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: top;
    width: 300px;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame > .Title {
    margin: 10px;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame > .Title h3 {
    display: inline;
    line-height: 14px;
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #fff;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame > .Title .WinStreak {
    display: inline-block;
    height: 19px;
    border: 1px solid transparent;
    border-radius: 2px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    color: #f2f2f2;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 20px;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame > .Title .WinStreak.Wins {
    background-color: #1f8ecd;
    border-color: #1a78ae;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame > .Title .WinStreak.Losses {
    background-color: #ee5a52;
    border-color: #c6443e;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent {
    display: table;
    width: 100%;
    table-layout: fixed;
    margin-top: 23px;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .WinRatio,
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .KDA,
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .Position {
    position: relative;
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: middle;
    padding-top: 14px;
    height: 134px;
    text-align: center;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .Label {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 14px;
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #fff;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .WinRatio span {
    line-height: 14px;
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #fff;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .WinRatio .Graph {
    position: relative;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .WinRatio .Graph > div {
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .WinRatio .Graph > span {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    margin-top: -7px;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    display: block;
    color: #fff;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .KDA .Content {
    line-height: 23px;
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .Position .ImageWrap {
    display: table;
    width: 100%;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .Position .Image {
    display: table-cell;
    height: 80px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .RecentGameContent .Position span {
    display: block;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 14px;
    color: #fff;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .RecentGame .NotFoundMessage {
    line-height: 14px;
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #9c9c9c;
    margin: 10px;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .TierRank {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: top;
    width: 145px;
    text-align: center;
    border-left: 1px solid #fff;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .TierRank .WinLose {
    margin-top: 10px;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .TierRank .WinLose .Title {
    line-height: 14px;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .TierRank .WinLose .Wins {
    line-height: 18px;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #1f8ecd;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .TierRank .WinLose .Losses {
    line-height: 18px;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #ee5a52;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .TierRank .WinLose .WinRatio {
    line-height: 18px;
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #fff;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .TierRank .Image img {
    display: block;
    width: 84px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .TierRank .TierRank {
    margin-top: 10px;
    line-height: 16px;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #1f8ecd;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .TierRank .TierRank .LP {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #d6dada;
    font-weight: normal;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .MostChampionSeason {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: top;
    border-left: 1px solid #cdd2d2;
    background: #262626;
    width: 60px;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .MostChampionSeason li {
    position: relative;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .MostChampionSeason li a {
    display: block;
    line-height: 16px;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #879292;
    padding: 12px 0;
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: none;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .MostChampionSeason li.active a {
    background: #1f8ecd;
    color: #fff;
}
.MultiSearchResultRowContent .MostChampionStats {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: top;
}
.MultiSearchLayout > .Header {
    width: 970px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.MultiSearchLayout > .ContentWrap > .Content {
    width: 970px;
    margin: 10px auto 0;
}

.champion-overview__table,

.l-champion-matchup-content,
.champion-matchup-graph-header,
.LadderRankingTable th.HeaderCell {
    border: none
}
tr.Row th,
tr.Row td {
    border: solid 0.5px transparent
}
custom-border,
.GameDetailTable.Result-WIN thead,
.champion-list-filter__keyword input,
.champion-skill-build__table td,
.champion-skill-build__table th {
    border: var(--border)
}
input,
select,
textarea,
.Modal .Title,
.RegionTool .Content > .Section > .Table > .Body > .Row > .Cell,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .Profile > .Information > .FavoriteButton,
.SummonerLayout > .Header > .PastRank > .PastRankList > .Item,
.SummonerRatingLine,
.Box > .Title,
.Box > .Tab > .TabList > .Item.active,
.Box > .Tab > .TabList > .Item,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Header,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap,
.GameAverageStats tr > .MostChampion ul li .KDA::before,
.GameItem.extended.Win > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader .tabHeaders,
.GameItem.Win > .Content,
.GameItem.extended.Win > .Content > div,
.GameItem.extended.Win > .Content > div.StatsButton,
.GameItem.extended.Lose > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader .tabHeaders,
.form-control input,
.form-control textarea,
.MasteryPageList > .Button:hover,
.MasteryPageWrap > .MasteryPageName,
.MasteryPageWrap .mastery-page-type__content,
.RunePageList > .Button:hover,
.RunePageWrap > .RunePageName,
.RunePageWrap > .RunePageStatistics,
.Button.White,
.SearchChampionInput > .InputTextWrap,
.ChampionHeader,
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.ChampionStatsDetailTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Value,
.SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Label,
.StatisticsFilter > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.StatisticsChampionTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.StatisticsFilter > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.statsLeagueBox > .FormItem > .RadioItems > .RadioItem,
.statsLeagueBox > .FormItem > .RadioItems,
.LadderRankingTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SearchChampion > .SearchChampionForm > .SearchInput,
.TeamIndexListBox > .Content > .TeamIndexGrid > .SearchTeamInput > input,
.Button.Gray,
.community-best__header,
.bestgg-summary__header,
.bestgg-summary__content__title,
.bestgg-summary__content__item,
.ChampionBanRateSummary > .Content > .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .RealContent .SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Label,
.MatchBuild > .SkillBuild > .Content > .RealContent .SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Value,
.MatchBuild > .RuneMastery > .Mastery,
.champion-overview__row--first,
.champion-overview__sub-header,
.champion-stats-summary-rune__item,
.champion-overview__data .perk-page-wrap .perk-page,
.perk-page-wrap .perk-page:first-child,
.champion-overview__table.champion-overview__table--rune tbody tr,
.champion-box--trend .champion-stats-trend,
.champion-matchup-table tr,
.champion-matchup-search,
.l-champion-matchup-side,
.champion-matchup-sort,
.champion-stats-header-info__image img,
.champion-stats-header-info__image span {
    border-color: var(--border-color)
}
.menu__item:hover > a,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item,
.ChampionStatsFilterMenu ul li.active,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button.active > .Role,
.champion-list-filter__type__item--active a,
.champion-index-trend-header__filter li.active a,
.champion-stats-header__tab__item.active,
.champion-stats-header__tab__item:hover {
    border-color: var(--fg-link)
}
.champion-index-trend-header__filter li.active a {
    border-color: var(--fg-link-visited)
}
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.active > a,
.MatchDetailLayout .MatchDetailContent > .Content > div,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu,
.ChampionTrendSummaryHeader ul li.active,
.ChampionTrendSummary .ChampionTrendSummaryContent,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox,
.GameItem.extended.Lose > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader li a,
.GameItem.extended.Lose > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader .tabHeaders,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team.Result-LOSE,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team.Result-WIN,
.l-champion-index-content .l-champion-index-content--side {
    border-color: transparent
}
.SpectateSummoner > .Box > .Content > .Table > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell {
    border-bottom-color: var(--border-color)
}
.MatchDetailHeader ul li.active,
.MatchDetailHeader ul li {
    border-bottom-color: var(--bg-odd)
}
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item > a,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.inGame > a,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu,
.Box,
.ChampionBox,
.Box > .Navigation,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Content > .SelectMatchChampionList > .Item,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Content > .SelectMatchChampionList > .Item > .Header,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Content > .SelectMatchChampionList > .Item.All,
.GameListContainer > .Header > .Navigation > .Actions > .Action > .ChampionMatchSearchWrap > .Content > .SelectMatchChampionList > .Item.Recent,
.GameAverageStats tr > .MostChampion,
.GameAverageStats tr > .Title,
.GameAverageStats tr > .PositionStats,
.GameItem.extended.Win > .GameDetail .MatchDetailHeader li a,
.GameDetailTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Damage > .Progress,
.ChampionWinRatioBox,
.GameItem.Win > .Content,
.MatchTeamAnalysisHeader ul,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell,
.ChampionStatsTable > .Header > .Row > .HeaderCell,
.MasteryPageList > .Button,
.RunePageList > .Button,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Content > .Row.series.last > .Cell,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item,
.SpectateSummonerList > .Item > .Content,
.ChampionTrendSummaryHeader ul,
.ChampionTrendSummaryPosition ul,
.ChampionDetailLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button.active,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button > .Role,
.ChampionStatsSummaryTable > .Content > .Row.First > .Cell,
.ChampionRankingSummaryBox > .Content > .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.ChampionStatsFilterMenu ul li,
.StatisticsChampionTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.LadderRankingTable > .Body > .Row > .Cell,
.ChampionRankingFilterBox > .SearchChampion,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox > .Content > .Roster > li > a,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox > .Title,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox > .Content > .Roster > li:nth-child(2n+1),
.community-article__list__item,
.l-wrap--index .community-best,
.l-wrap--index .bestgg-summary,
.ChampionIndexGrid > .Item > .Link.Champion > .ChampionImage,
.ChampionBanRateSummary > .Content > .Table > .Content > .Row > .Cell,
.ChampionHeader > .ChampionRole > .ChampionRoleList > .Item > .Button,
.MatchAnalysisListItemContent .MatchAnalysisTable .GraphWrap .Values .Value:first-child,
.MatchBuild .Title,
.BestGGBox > .Footer,
.first-time-user__title,
.first-time-user,
.champion-list-filter,
.champion-index-trend-header,
.champion-index-trend-champion__item,
.champion-stats-header__tab__item,
.l-champion-statistics-menu,
.champion-overview__header,
.champion-overview__table.champion-overview__table--summonerspell tbody tr,
.champion-overview__border::before,
.champion-box-header,
.champion-stats-summary-ranking__table tr,
.champion-matchup-champion-list__item,
.champion-stats__table__header,
.MMRBox > .Content {
    border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)
}
.MatchDetailHeader ul li.active a {
    border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important
}
.Box > .Navigation .List > .Item.active,
.PageHeaderWrap > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.active,
.ChampionTrendSummaryPosition ul li.active,
.champion-stats-menu__list__item.active a,
.champion-matchup-graph-header-item.active a {
    border-bottom-color: var(--fg)
}
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Bar.Result-WIN > div::after,
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Bar.Result-LOSE > div {
    border-bottom-color: #a41 !important
}
.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Bar.Result-LOSE > div::after {
    border-bottom-color: #117faa !important
}
.GameItem.Win > .Content > .StatsButton {
    border-color: transparent;
    border-left: solid 0.5px var(--border-color)
}
.champion-stats__filter__item {
    border-top-color: var(--bg-odd)
}

.Box,
.tabWrap._recognized {
    box-shadow: none
}
.GameItem,
.tabWrap,
.SummonersMostGame,
.RegisterSummonerList > li > .RegisterSummonerBox,
.TeamIndexListBox,
.first-time-user,
.champion-index-trend-champion__item:hover,
.champion-overview__table colgroup,
.champion-box {
    box-shadow: 0 0 4px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
}
.GameDetailTable.Result-WIN > .Content > .Row.isRequester,
.LeagueContainer > .LeagueContent .Table > .Content > .Row.me,
.SkillBuildTable > .Content > .Row > .Cell.Value.LevelUP.Master,
td.champion-matchup-data--win,
td.champion-matchup-data--win:first-child {
    box-shadow: 0 0 3px 3px #fa4 inset
}

success,
success a {
    background-color: var(--bg-success);
    color: var(--fg-success)
}
info,
info a,
.SummonerLayout > .Menu > .MenuList > .Item.inGame > a,
.GameItem.Win > .Content {
    background-color: var(--bg-info);
    color: var(--fg-info)
}
warning,
warning a {
    background-color: var(--bg-warning);
    color: var(--fg-warning)
}
error,
error a,
.SpectatorError,
.SpectatorError h2 {
    background-color: var(--bg-error);
    color: var(--fg-error)
}
disabled {
    background-color: var(--bg-disabled);
    color: var(--fg-disabled)
}

pre {
    background-color: var(--syntax-bg);
    border: none
}
pre {
    color: var(--syntax-fg)
}


.GameDetailTableWrap > .Summary > .Team > .ObjectScore,
.TeamScore img {
    filter: brightness(190%)
}
.Emblems .__spSite,
.champion-overview__more img,
.champion-box-header__link img,
.champion-matchup-versus img {
    filter: invert(100%) brightness(200%)
}
.StatisticsSummonersWithLeague > .Content > .Row > .Cell {
    filter: saturate(400%) brightness(90%)
}

.highcharts-container {
    stroke: #e0e0e0 !important;
    stroke-width: 0.2 !important;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px #000 !important
}

.SummonerRatingMedium {
    display: table;
    width: 100%;
    color: #879292;
    position: relative;
    background-color: #262626;
    border: solid 1px #cdd2d2;
}

.sub-tier {
    margin-top: 8px;
    padding: 16px 0;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    background-color: #262626;
    border: solid 1px #cdd2d2;
}

.SummonerRatingMedium > .TierRankInfo > .Position {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #1fdada;
}

.SummonerRatingLine {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 8px;
    border-top: 1px solid #cdd2d2;
    background-color: #262626;
    color: #879292;
    border: solid 1px #cdd2d2;
}

.SummonerRatingLine > .TierRank > .Position {
    font-size: 12px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #1fdada;
}
}
